author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: IPL 2017 auction: 2017 IPL auction: How the franchises spent - Times of India
text:
NEW DELHI: At the end of a frenzied day of bidding during the 2017 IPL player auction in Bangalore, here is how the eight franchises look ahead of the tenth season of the league. 

KINGS XI PUNJAB 

Purse: Rs 23.35 crore 

Spent: Rs 9.45 crore 

Bought: T Natarajan Rs 3 crore (base 10 lakh), Martin Guptill (base 50 lakh) Varun Aaron Rs 2.8 crore (base 30 lakh), Eoin Morgan Rs 2 crore (base price 2 crore), Matt Henry Rs 50 lakh (base 50 lakh), Darren Sammy Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Rahul Tewatia Rs 25 lakh (base 10 lakh), Rinku Singh Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: David Miller, Manan Vohra, Axar Patel, Glenn Maxwell, Gurkeerat Mann, Anureet Singh, Sandeep Sharma, Shardul Thakur, Shaun Marsh, Wriddhiman Saha, Murali Vijay, Nikhil Naik, Mohit Sharma, Marcus Stoinis, KC Cariarpa, Armaan Jaffer, Pardeep Sahu, Swapnil Singh, Hashim Amla 

Squad strength: 27 

Overseas players: 9 



DELHI DAREDEVILS 

Purse: Rs 23.1 crore 

Spent: Rs 14.05 crore 

Bought: Kagiso Rabada Rs 5 crore (base 1 crore), Pat Cummins Rs 4.5 crore (base price 2 crore), Angelo Mathews Rs 2 crore (base price 2 crore), Corey Anderson Rs 1 crore (base 1 crore), Murugan Ashwin Rs 1 crore (base 10 lakh), Aditya Tare Rs 25 lakh (base 20 lakh), Ankit Bawne Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Navdeep Saini Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), 
Shashank Singh Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: JP Duminy, Mohammed Shami, Quinton de Kock, Shahbaz Nadeem, Jayant Yadav, Amit Mishra, Shreyas Iyer, Zaheer Khan, Sanju Samson, Chris Morris, Carlos Brathwaite, Karun Nair, Rishabh Pant, Chama Milind, Syed Ahmed, Pratyush Singh, Sam Billings 

Squad strength: 26 

Overseas players: 9 



SUNRISERS HYDERABAD 

Purse: Rs 20.9 crore 

Spent: Rs 8.65 crore 

Bought: Rashid Khan Rs 4 crore (base 50 lakh), Mohammed Siraj Rs 2.6 crore (base 20 lakh), Eklavya Dwivedi Rs 75 lakh (base 30 lakh), Chris Jordan Rs 50 lakh (base 50 lakh), Mohammad Nabi Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Ben Laughlin Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Tanmay Agarwal Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Pravin Tambe Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: Shikhar Dhawan, Bhuvneshar Kumar, David Warner, Moises Henriques, Naman Ojha, Ricky Bhui, Kane Willamson, Siddarth Kaul, Bipul Sharma, Ashish Nehra, Yuvraj Singh, Ben Cutting, Abhimanyu Singh, Mustafizur Rahman, Barinder Sran, Deepak Hooda, Vijay Shankar 

Squad strength: 25 

Overseas players: 9 



KOLKATA KNIGHT RIDERS 

Purse: Rs 19.75 crore 

Spent: Rs 14.35 crore 

Bought: Trent Boult Rs 5 crore (base 1.5 crore), Chris Woakes Rs 4.2 crore (base 2 crore), Nathan Coulter-Nile Rs 3.5 crore (base 1 crore), Rishi Dhawan Rs 55 lakh (base 30 lakh), Darren Bravo Rs 50 lakh (base 50 lakh), Rovman Powell Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), R Sanjay Yadav Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Ishank Jaggi Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Sayan Ghosh Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: Gautam Gambhir, Sunil Narine, Andre Russell, Kuldeep Yadav, Manish Pandey, Suryakumar Yadav, Piyush Chawla, Robin Uthappa, Shakib Al Hasan, Chris Lynn, Umesh Yadav, Yusuf Pathan, Sheldon Jackson, Ankit Rajpoot 

Squad strength: 23 

Overseas players: 9 



RISING PUNE SUPERGIANTS 

Purse: Rs 17.5 crore 

Spent: Rs 17.2 crore 

Bought: Ben Stokes Rs 14.5 crore (base price 2 crore), Dan Christian Rs 1 crore (base 1 crore), Manoj Tiwary Rs 50 lakh (base 50 lakh), Lockie Ferguson Rs 50 lakh (base 50 lakh), Jaydev Unadkat Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Rahul Chahar Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Saurabh Kumar Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Milind Tandon Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Rahul Ajay Tripathi Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: MS Dhoni, Ajinya Rahane, R Ashwin, Steven Smith, Faf du Plessis, Mitchell Marsh, Ashok Dinda, Ankush Bains, Rajat Bhatia, Ankit Sharma, Ishwar Pandey, Adam Zampa, Jaskaran Singh, Baba Aparajith, Deepak Chahar, Usman Khawaja 

Squad strength: 26 

Overseas players: 8 



GUJARAT LIONS 

Purse: Rs 14.35 crore 

Spent: Rs 3.85 crore 

Bought: Jason Roy Rs 1 crore (base Rs 1 crore), Basil Thampy Rs 85 lakh (base 10 lakh), Manpreet Gony Rs 60 lakh (base 30 lakh), Nathu Singh Rs 50 lakh (base 30 lakh), Munaf Patel Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Chirag Suri Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Shelly Shaurya Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Shubham Agarwal Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Pratham Singh Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh), Akshdeep Nath Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: Suresh Raina, Ravindra Jadeja, James Faulkner, Brendon McCullum, Dwayne Bravo, Aaron Finch, Dwayne Smith, Dinesh Karthik, Dhawal Kulkarni, Praveen Kumar, Andrew Tye, Ishan Kishan, Pradeep Sangwan, Shivil Kaushik, Shadab Jakati, Jaydev Shah 

Squad strength: 27 

Overseas players: 8 


ROYAL CHALLENGERS BANGALORE 

Purse: Rs 17.825 crore 

Spent: Rs 15.4 crore 

Bought: Tymal Mills Rs 12 crore (base price 50 lakh), Aniket Choudhary Rs 2 crore (base 10 lakh), 
Pawan Negi Rs 1 crore (base price 30 lakh), Billy Stanlake Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Praveen Dubey Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: Virat Kohli, AB de Villiers, Chris Gayle, Yuzvendra Chahal, Harshal Patel, Mandeep Singh, Adam Milne, Sarfaraz Khan, S Aravind, Kedar Jadhav, Shane Watson, Stuart Binny, Samuel Badree, Travis Head, Sachin Baby, Iqbal Abdulla, KL Rahul, Avesh Khan, Tabraiz Shamsi 

Squad strength: 24 

Overseas players: 9 


MUMBAI INDIANS 

Purse: Rs 11.555 crore 

Spent: Rs 8.2 crore 

Bought: Karn Sharma Rs 3.2 crore (base 30 lakh), Mitchell Johnson Rs 2 crore (base price 2 crore), 
K Gowtham Rs 2 crore (base 10 lakh), Asela Gunaratne Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Nicholas Pooran Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Saurabh Tiwary Rs 30 lakh (base 30 lakh), Kulwant Khejroliya Rs 10 lakh (base 10 lakh) 

Earlier retained: Rohit Sharma, Kieron Pollard, Lasith Malinga, Harbhajan Singh, Ambati Rayudu, Jasprit Bumrah, Shreyas Gopal, Lendl Simmons, Vinay Kumar, Parthiv Patel, Mitchell McClenaghan, Nitish Rana, Siddhesh Lad, J Suchith, Hardik Pandya, Jitesh Sharma, Deepak Poona, Jos Buttler, Tim Southee 

Squad strength: 27 

Overseas players: 9
